Name: Percentage of cases where 'Payment Handled' occurs without any prior 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' following the variant path that includes 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' compared to all variants ending in 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions that originate from cases never encountering 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events preceded by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' without any intervening 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total activity executions represented by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that contain at least one 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' versus variants that do not
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' occurrences that are part of the most frequent variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' that directly follows 'Request Payment' without any rejection loops involving 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in cases that passed through 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and avoided 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' instances that eventually lead to a 'Payment Handled' (i.e., recovery rate after this specific rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of 'Payment Handled' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE', indicating overall process completion efficiency
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' events occurring in variants that include exactly one approval step by a pre-approver (either approved or rejected)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in domestic reimbursement cases (inferred from absence of pre-approval steps) versus cases requiring pre-approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' that occurs within variants containing no rejection activities at all
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of times 'Payment Handled' is performed after a re-submission following 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of total variants ending in 'Payment Handled' that avoid any interaction with 'PRE_APPROVER' role entirely
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Payment Handled' frequency in variants with 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to those with 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions that conclude a case within the minimal expected path (five activities: SUBMITTED → ADMINISTRATION → FINAL_APPROVED → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' executions per year, to assess temporal trends in successful completions
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Payment Handled'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
